p: A total of 887.4 g of dried PB larvae were ground, and the components were extracted with distilled water (15 L) under reflux at 100 ± 2 °C for 3 h. The extract was filtered, evaporated in an air vacuum, and freeze-dried to obtain the crude extract (242.8 g, 27.4%), which was then stored at −20 °C for this study.
